description: Try our easy to follow Roast Capsicum Relish recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Relish,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Roast Capsicum Relish Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put red capsicums on a baking tray lined with baking paper.
Spray with olive oil and roast for 35-40 minutes or until skin of capsicum is charred and blistered.
Transfer to a bowl and cover with plastic. Leave to cool. Remove skin from capsicum, halve, remove seeds and slice thinly. Transfer to a serving bowl.
Add chives, rinsed baby salted capers, olive oil, white wine vinegar, salt and white pepper. Stir until combined.
